sentence.Network_en: A headless rider haunts the country lanes.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个无头骑士常出没于乡间的小路上。

sentence.Network_en: The headless torso of a man was found in some bushes.
sentence.Network_cn: 在灌木丛中发现了一具无头男尸.

sentence.Network_en: Instead of running round like a headless chicken use your efforts in a more productive way.
sentence.Network_cn: 别像只没头苍蝇东一头西一头的，力气要用对地方。
